description.baseline: Distance from top where the letter sits on the line
description.breakForce: Force required to break the joint
description.collideConnected: Whether the connected bodies should collide
description.limits: Angular limits for revolute joints in radians (-45 to +45 degrees)
description.restitutionCombineRule: How to combine restitution values when objects collide
description.friction: Surface friction of the parts (0.0 to 1.0)
description.frictionCombineRule: How to combine friction values when objects collide
description.enableCollisionEvents: Whether to enable collision event detection
description.enableContactForceEvents: Whether to enable contact force event detection
description.contactForceEventThreshold: Minimum force required to trigger a contact force event
